title: Covid-19 Vaccine Holdouts Face Restrictions in Europe as Delta Variant Spreads
content:
1. Covid-19 Vaccine Holdouts Face Restrictions in Europe as Delta Variant Spreads  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Italy to mandate COVID vaccine pass for entry to museums, theaters and restaurants  The Points Guy
  3. Italy Will Require COVID Passes for Restaurants, Museums, and More  Travel + Leisure
  4. Italy Becomes the Latest European Country to Require Proof of Vaccination or a Negative Test to Visit Museums  artnet News
  5. Green Pass: Rome surge in covid vaccine bookings  Wanted in Rome

localize.title: Covid-19 ワクチンを保持していた人々がヨーロッパで制限を受け、デルタ型が広がる
随着Delta变体的扩散，Covid-19疫苗的持有者在欧洲面临限制
隨着Delta變體的擴散，Covid-19疫苗的持有者在歐洲面臨限制
